ingredients.item: 200g essential Waitrose Easy Cook Long Grain Rice
400g pack Waitrose Lean Aberdeen Angus Beef Mince
28g sachet Santa Maria Medium Fajita Seasoning Mix
400g can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Cook the rice in boiling water for 12-15 minutes or until tender, then drain.
Meanwhile, fry the mince, onion and celery in a large saucepan for 2-3 minutes to brown. Stir in the fajita seasoning mix and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the kidney beans, sweetcorn and chopped tomatoes, then half fill the tomato canÂ with water and add to the pan. Simmer gently for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in the rice and coriander, then season and serve.
